sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useContext } from 'react' import { useParams, useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { HiArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/hi' import { AppContext } from '../../context/context' import './Detail.css' export default Detail => { const navigate = useNavigate() const { characters } = useContext(AppContext) const { id } = useParams() const character = characters.filter(e => e.id === Number(id))[0] ?? { "id": 2, "name": "Morty Smith", "status": "Alive", "species": "Human", "type": "", "gender": "Male", "origin": { "name": "Earth", "url": "https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/location/1" }, "location": { "name": "Earth", "url": "https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/location/20" }, "image": "https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/avatar/2.jpeg", "episode": [ "https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/episode/1", "https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/episode/2", ], "url": "https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character/2", "created": "2017-11-04T18:50:21.651Z" } useEffect(() => { // if( !characters.length ) navigate('/') }, []) console.log( character ) return (
{ character && ( <>
{ character.name }
Especie { character.species === 'Human' ? 'humano' : 'alien' }
Género { character.gender === 'Male' ? 'masculino' : 'femenino' }
Estado { character.status === 'Alive' ? 'vivo' : 'muerto' }
Orígen { character.origin.name }
Volver
)}
); }
